definitions.definition: Widely cultivated cereal grass , typically Avena sativa .
examples: The oat stalks made good straw.
The main forms of oat are meal and bran.
World trade in oat is increasing.

definitions.definition: Any of the numerous species, varieties, or cultivars of any of several similar grain plants in genus Avena .
examples: The wild red oat is thought to be the ancestor of modern food oats .

definitions.definition: The seeds of the oat, a grain , harvested as a food crop and for animal feed .
A simple musical pipe made of oat-straw.
The tiniest amount; a whit or jot .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Widely cultivated cereal grass , typically Avena sativa .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Any of the numerous species, varieties, or cultivars of any of several similar grain plants in genus Avena .
( usually as plural ) The seeds of the oat, a grain , harvested as a food crop and for animal feed .
A simple musical pipe made of oat-straw.
The tiniest amount; a whit or jot .
